summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5656 for the improvement of The Alleys in Block 5, Beacon Heights Addition, being the north and south alley between Beacon Avenue and 17th Avenue South, from Stevens Street to the east and west alley in said block, and said east and west alley between Hanford Street and Stevens Street, from Beacon Avenue to 17th Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74736, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
